As their master's last moments came,
the dragons were freed from their
pacts—but they were unsure what to
do. Should they stay with him and
perish, or grant his wish and leave?

context.en_us:
They all looked to the Windwyrm for
guidance. With a glance to his
former master, he spread his wings
and flew off. And though they waited
for him to look back, he did not.

碧龙看了一眼主人阿尔贝琉斯，

碧龍看了主人阿爾博流斯一眼

context.en_us:
His master's will could not die here.
It needed to be passed on through
the kingdom and the ages—and the
Windwyrm was the only one who truly
knew all of it.

而是應該在這王國流傳下去。
知道他所有壯志的，只有碧龍。

context.en_us:
As such, he had a duty to live on and
preserve it in his mind, for he knew
that one day he would have to pass
it to someone else.
context.ja_jp:
ならば、<ruby><rb>生</rb><rt>い</rt></ruby>きて<ruby><rb>覚</rb><rt>おぼ</rt></ruby>えていよう。
いつか<ruby><rb>誰</rb><rt>だれ</rt></ruby>かに<ruby><rb>伝</rb><rt>つた</rt></ruby>えることも

「<ruby><rb>汝</rb><rt>なんじ</rt></ruby>が<ruby><rb>創造</rb><rt>そうぞう</rt></ruby>せし<ruby><rb>王国</rb><rt>おうこく</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>行</rb><rt>ゆ</rt></ruby>く<ruby><rb>末</rb><rt>すえ</rt></ruby>を

也许有一天
会告诉其他人：
“我来见证你所创造的
王国的未来！”

既然如此，
便與此記憶共存便是。
或許有朝一日，可與他人論述。
「吾定會見證
汝所創國度之未來！」

context.en_us:
After seeing the Windwyrm act, the
other dragons cast aside their own
hesitations and took to the skies.
The Windwyrm continued to soar,
his gaze resolutely forward.

context.en_us:
He had spent more time with Alberius
than anyone. And while his memories
flew past him like a storm, he
continued to look to the future
instead of the past.

如疾風般在眼前閃瞬即逝，

context.en_us:
That day, the sadness of the dragons
consumed all creation. Harsh gales
tore at the land, lightning rained
from the sky, and darkness spread
across the world.

黑暗笼罩了整个世界。

But such things eventually ceased,
and a peaceful breeze began to blow
over a grateful land. As it did, the
Windwyrm recalled the day he first
met his master.

It had been the beginning of a new
era—one that was now coming to an
end. With that thought in his mind,
the Windwyrm gazed out across the
entire kingdom.

如今，那璀璨的時代已落幕，

He did not know if he would ever
meet a man as befitting of the word
＂storm＂ as Alberius was, but he swore
to begin a peaceful new life deep
in a misty forest.

迷雾缭绕的森林中。

未來還能遇到
像阿爾博流斯般的風暴嗎……

context.en_us: Many ages passed, and once more,\nthe Windwyrm met a storm—one that\ncarried the blood of Alberius, no less.

No longer is the lord of maelstroms in
a misty forest. Now he is in a castle
filled with calm wind—the eye of the
storm. And a new age is beginning
once more...

context.zh_cn:
如今的碧龙
不再生活在迷雾缭绕的森林，
而是身处微风吹拂的城堡里。
这里是风暴中心。
和那时一样，新时代正拉开序幕。

如今，碧龍所在之處

而是在溫和的風吹拂的城堡中。
這裡是風暴的中心，和那時一樣，
精彩耀眼的時代將在此展開。
